      • [General_Info] Lifestyle changes to control DM. Info available here.
  • dTwo drug choices II
    • Make rec's preferred(strict rule-in condition not at goal and not bad TZD and gemfibrozil evaluate to true because HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013) && NOT (Pres gemfibrozil and TZD and not TZD contra))])
  • Can Intensify or Sub
    • dIntensify II preferred(strict rule-in condition true evaluate to true )])
  • dIntensify choices II
    • dIncrease dose preferred(strict rule-in condition there exists non-contraindicated meds not at max level according to DM guideline evaluate to true )])
      • Evaluate_Increase_Activity_Intensity consider increasing dose of drugs
  • dNo Incr dose choice
    • dNo incr dose preferred(strict rule-in condition Absence DM med rec inc and incr blocked evaluate to true because NOT contraindication to non insulin agent)])
      • [Drug_Related] Not able to increase METFORMIN. Adding another DM med.
  • dCannot Increase dose choices
    • Rec 1st and 2nd line preferred(strict rule-in condition 1 or 2 DM ecoded meds evaluate to true because not 3+ encoded DM medsEncoded DM Drugs(1) && Encoded DM Drugs(1))])
      • Evaluate_Start_Activity Evaluate start 1st and and 2nd line
      • Evaluate_Start_Activity Initiate empa
  • No meds, No recs
    • d3rd line therapy preferred(strict rule-in condition Absence of oral hypoglycemic agent rec add AND blocked add evaluate to true )])
      • [Drug_Related] Cannot recommend metformin, glipizide, pioglitazone, saxagliptin or, if CVD present, empaglifozin. Please consider other drugs from Appendix B of the VA 2017 DM Guidelines .
      • [Follow_Up] Follow up in 3 months
Considerations for adding drug:
  • Thiazolidinediones
    • preferred drug: Pioglitazone
    • preference: neutral
    • fine-grained priority: 0
    • No comment
  • Glipizide
    • preferred drug: Glipizide
    • preference: neutral
    • fine-grained priority: 0
    • No comment
  • Saxagliptin
    • Relative contraindications: eGFR<45 most recent any time frame([eGFR(44.0:06/11/2013)])
    • preference: neutral
    • fine-grained priority: 0
  • Biguanide
    • preferred drug: Metformin
    • Already being used
    • Do not add uncontrollable conditions: 30<=eGFR<45 in past 30 days([eGFR(44.0:06/11/2013) && eGFR(44.0:06/11/2013)])
    • preference: ruled out
    • fine-grained priority: 0
Considerations for adding drug:
  • Empagliflozin
    • Contraindications: Abs Empa and eGFR<45 past 30 days([eGFR(44.0:06/11/2013)])
    • Relative indications: CVD DM(CVD_DM)
    • preference: ruled out
    • fine-grained priority: 200
null

Session time: 2013-07-3

Reached goal? failed(HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))

Recommended Actions

 Message: Check B12 levels every 2 years as pt has Rx for metformin.

 Message Type: Primary_Recommendation
 Message: GFR  44.0 (2013/6/11).  Assess risk with metformin.
 Message: Msg Start insulin
 Message Type: General_Info
 Message: If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.
 Message: Set target HbA1c 2017
 Message Type: General_Info
 Message: Refer to   Table 2 from VA 2017 DM Guidelines  to determine HbA1c target.
 Message: Shared Decision Making Msg
 Message Type: General_Info
 Message: Strongly recommend shared decision making process, where pt, family and provider agree to plan of care and treatment. Info available  here.
 Message: TLC
 Message Type: General_Info
 Message: Lifestyle changes to control DM.  Info available  here.
 Evaluate_Increase_Activity_Intensity: consider increasing dose of drugs
 Message: Param msg for drug not at max dose
 Message Type: Drug_Related
 Message: Not able to increase METFORMIN.  Adding another DM med.
 Evaluate_Start_Activity: Evaluate start 1st and and 2nd line
 Evaluate_Start_Activity: Initiate empa
 Message: Msg No recs; Link to other DM drugs
 Message Type: Drug_Related
 Message: Cannot recommend metformin, glipizide, pioglitazone, saxagliptin or, if CVD present, empaglifozin.  Please consider other   drugs from Appendix B of the VA 2017 DM Guidelines  .
 Message: Follow up in 3 months
 Message Type: Follow_Up

ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard

KB loaded from /Users/tu/Documents/Dropbox/VA/ATHENA/athenakbs/ATHENA_DM_GlycemicControl_Dashboard.pprj(last modified: 05/31/2018)

Patient classification:
  • ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard: true[because Eligibility criteria evaluate to true(Age(65.0:01/01/1970) && NOT (Pres of DM-1 and Abs of DM-2) && Age(65.0:01/01/1970))]
Scenario choice: Scenario on One or Two encoded drugs not insulin

Goal: HbA1c <= 9%(Presence of HbA1c)

Reached goal? failed(HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))

Action Choices

  • dAll CDS scenarios No ACE/ARB
    • MPR checks preferred(rule in criterion Presence of DM guideline med with 0.0 < MPR < 0.9 evaluate to true because Medication(70.0,70.0,METFORMIN))])
      • [Primary_Recommendation] METFORMIN (MPR= 70.0 %). Discuss with pt.
    • Msg start Insulin preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.
    • Set target HbA1c 2017 preferred(rule in criterion Absence Target HBA1c evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Refer to Table 2 from VA 2017 DM Guidelines to determine HbA1c target.
    • Shared Decision Making Action preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Strongly recommend shared decision making process, where pt, family and provider agree to plan of care and treatment. Info available here.
    • Very low GFR Alert preferred(rule in criterion most recent eGFR<30 no time frame evaluate to true because eGFR(29.0:06/11/2013))])
      • Referral Refer to nephrologist
      • [Primary_Recommendation] ALERT: GFR 29.0 (2013/6/11)
    • TLC preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Lifestyle changes to control DM. Info available here.
  • dTwo drug choices II
    • Make rec's preferred(strict rule-in condition not at goal and not bad TZD and gemfibrozil evaluate to true because HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013) && NOT (Pres gemfibrozil and TZD and not TZD contra))])
  • Can Intensify or Sub
    • dIntensify II preferred(strict rule-in condition true evaluate to true )])
    • dSubstitute preferred(strict rule-in condition Presence of contraindication and no bad drug partner DM evaluate to true )])
      • Evaluate_Substitution_Activity dEvaluate substitution first line agent
  • dIntensify choices II
    • dIncrease dose preferred(strict rule-in condition there exists non-contraindicated meds not at max level according to DM guideline evaluate to true )])
      • Evaluate_Increase_Activity_Intensity consider increasing dose of drugs
  • No 1st or 2nd ine drug rec sub
    • Link to alternalternative sub preferred(strict rule-in condition Absence of oral hypoglycemic agent rec add AND blocked add evaluate to true )])
      • [Drug_Related] Cannot recommend metformin, glipizide, pioglitazone, saxagliptin or, if CVD present, empaglifozin. Please consider other drugs from Appendix B of the VA 2017 DM Guidelines .
      • [Drug_Related] METFORMIN is contraindicated but no substitution found.
  • dNo Incr dose choice
    • Msg follow up 3 months incr dose preferred(strict rule-in condition Pres non-insulin agent rec incr or block incr evaluate to true )])
      • [Follow_Up] Follow up in 3 months
If changing attribute, consider:
  • GLIPIZIDE(change daily_dose: up to High_Dose(high/low)
    • preferred
    • fine-grained priority: 300
    )

 Message Type: Primary_Recommendation
 Message: METFORMIN (MPR= 70.0 %). Discuss with pt.
 Message: Msg Start insulin
 Message Type: General_Info
 Message: If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.
 Message: Set target HbA1c 2017
 Message Type: General_Info
 Message: Refer to   Table 2 from VA 2017 DM Guidelines  to determine HbA1c target.
 Message: Shared Decision Making Msg
 Message Type: General_Info
 Message: Strongly recommend shared decision making process, where pt, family and provider agree to plan of care and treatment. Info available  here.
 Referral: Refer to nephrologist
 Refer to: nephrologist
 Message: ALERT: very low GFR
 Message Type: Primary_Recommendation
 Message: ALERT:  GFR  29.0 (2013/6/11)
 Message: TLC
 Message Type: General_Info
 Message: Lifestyle changes to control DM.  Info available  here.
 Evaluate_Substitution_Activity: dEvaluate substitution first line agent
 Message: Msg No recs; Link to other DM drugs
 Message Type: Drug_Related
 Message: Cannot recommend metformin, glipizide, pioglitazone, saxagliptin or, if CVD present, empaglifozin.  Please consider other   drugs from Appendix B of the VA 2017 DM Guidelines  .
 Message: Param msg for contra drug cannot substitute
 Message Type: Drug_Related
 Message: METFORMIN is contraindicated but no substitution found.
 Evaluate_Increase_Activity_Intensity: consider increasing dose of drugs
 Message: Follow up in 3 months
 Message Type: Follow_Up
 Message: Follow up in 3 months

ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard

KB loaded from /Users/tu/Documents/Dropbox/VA/ATHENA/athenakbs/ATHENA_DM_GlycemicControl_Dashboard.pprj(last modified: 05/31/2018)

Patient classification:
  • ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard: true[because Eligibility criteria evaluate to true(Age(65.0:01/01/1970) && NOT (Pres of DM-1 and Abs of DM-2) && Age(65.0:01/01/1970))]
Scenario choice: Scenario on One or Two encoded drugs not insulin

Goal: HbA1c <= 9%(Presence of HbA1c)

Reached goal? failed(HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))

Action Choices

  • dAll CDS scenarios No ACE/ARB
    • Metformin checks preferred(rule in criterion Pres biguanide and not biguanide contraindicated evaluate to true because not biguanide contraindicated)])
      • [General_Info] Check B12 levels every 2 years as pt has Rx for metformin.
    • MPR checks preferred(rule in criterion Presence of DM guideline med with 0.0 < MPR < 0.9 evaluate to true because Medication(70.0,70.0,METFORMIN))])
      • [Primary_Recommendation] METFORMIN (MPR= 70.0 %). Discuss with pt.
    • Msg start Insulin preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.
    • Set target HbA1c 2017 preferred(rule in criterion Absence Target HBA1c evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Refer to Table 2 from VA 2017 DM Guidelines to determine HbA1c target.
    • Shared Decision Making Action preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Strongly recommend shared decision making process, where pt, family and provider agree to plan of care and treatment. Info available here.
    • TLC preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Lifestyle changes to control DM. Info available here.
  • dTwo drug choices II
    • Make rec's preferred(strict rule-in condition not at goal and not bad TZD and gemfibrozil evaluate to true because HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013) && NOT (Pres gemfibrozil and TZD and not TZD contra))])
  • Can Intensify or Sub
    • dIntensify II preferred(strict rule-in condition true evaluate to true )])
  • dIntensify choices II
    • dIncrease dose preferred(strict rule-in condition there exists non-contraindicated meds not at max level according to DM guideline evaluate to true )])
      • Evaluate_Increase_Activity_Intensity consider increasing dose of drugs
  • dNo Incr dose choice
    • Msg follow up 3 months incr dose preferred(strict rule-in condition Pres non-insulin agent rec incr or block incr evaluate to true )])
      • [Follow_Up] Follow up in 3 months
If changing attribute, consider:
  • METFORMIN(change daily_dose: up to High_Dose(high/low)
    • preferred
    • fine-grained priority: 300
    )
null

Session time: 2013-07-3

Scenario choice: Scenario on One or Two encoded drugs not insulin

Goal: HbA1c <= 9%(Presence of HbA1c)

Reached goal? failed(HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))

Action Choices

  • dAll CDS scenarios No ACE/ARB
    • MPR checks preferred(rule in criterion Presence of DM guideline med with 0.0 < MPR < 0.9 evaluate to true because Medication(70.0,70.0,METFORMIN))])
      • [Primary_Recommendation] METFORMIN (MPR= 70.0 %). Discuss with pt.
    • Msg start Insulin preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.
    • Set target HbA1c 2017 preferred(rule in criterion Absence Target HBA1c evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Refer to Table 2 from VA 2017 DM Guidelines to determine HbA1c target.
    • Shared Decision Making Action preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Strongly recommend shared decision making process, where pt, family and provider agree to plan of care and treatment. Info available here.
    • Very low GFR Alert preferred(rule in criterion most recent eGFR<30 no time frame evaluate to true because eGFR(29.0:06/11/2013))])
      • Referral Refer to nephrologist
      • [Primary_Recommendation] ALERT: GFR 29.0 (2013/6/11)
    • TLC preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Lifestyle changes to control DM. Info available here.
  • dTwo drug choices II
    • Make rec's preferred(strict rule-in condition not at goal and not bad TZD and gemfibrozil evaluate to true because HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013) && NOT (Pres gemfibrozil and TZD and not TZD contra))])
  • Can Intensify or Sub
    • dIntensify II preferred(strict rule-in condition true evaluate to true )])
    • dSubstitute preferred(strict rule-in condition Presence of contraindication and no bad drug partner DM evaluate to true )])
      • Evaluate_Substitution_Activity dEvaluate substitution first line agent
  • dIntensify choices II
  • No 1st or 2nd ine drug rec sub
    • Link to alternalternative sub preferred(strict rule-in condition Absence of oral hypoglycemic agent rec add AND blocked add evaluate to true )])
      • [Drug_Related] Cannot recommend metformin, glipizide, pioglitazone, saxagliptin or, if CVD present, empaglifozin. Please consider other drugs from Appendix B of the VA 2017 DM Guidelines .
      • [Drug_Related] METFORMIN, GLIPIZIDE is contraindicated but no substitution found.

  • ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard: true[because Eligibility criteria evaluate to true(Age(65.0:01/01/1970) && NOT (Pres of DM-1 and Abs of DM-2) && Age(65.0:01/01/1970))]

  • dAll CDS scenarios No ACE/ARB
    • Metformin checks preferred(rule in criterion Pres biguanide and not biguanide contraindicated evaluate to true because not biguanide contraindicated)])
      • [General_Info] Check B12 levels every 2 years as pt has Rx for metformin.
      • [Primary_Recommendation] GFR 44.0 (2013/6/11). Assess risk with metformin.
    • Msg start Insulin preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.
    • Set target HbA1c 2017 preferred(rule in criterion Absence Target HBA1c evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Refer to Table 2 from VA 2017 DM Guidelines to determine HbA1c target.
    • Shared Decision Making Action preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Strongly recommend shared decision making process, where pt, family and provider agree to plan of care and treatment. Info available here.
    • TLC preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Lifestyle changes to control DM. Info available here.
  • dTwo drug choices II
    • Make rec's preferred(strict rule-in condition not at goal and not bad TZD and gemfibrozil evaluate to true because HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013) && NOT (Pres gemfibrozil and TZD and not TZD contra))])
  • Can Intensify or Sub
    • dIntensify II preferred(strict rule-in condition true evaluate to true )])
    • dSubstitute preferred(strict rule-in condition Presence of contraindication and no bad drug partner DM evaluate to true )])
      • Evaluate_Substitution_Activity dEvaluate substitution first line agent
      • Evaluate_Substitution_Activity dEvaluate sub Empa
  • No 1st or 2nd ine drug rec sub
    • Link to alternalternative sub preferred(strict rule-in condition Absence of oral hypoglycemic agent rec add AND blocked add evaluate to true )])
      • [Drug_Related] Cannot recommend metformin, glipizide, pioglitazone, saxagliptin or, if CVD present, empaglifozin. Please consider other drugs from Appendix B of the VA 2017 DM Guidelines .
      • [Drug_Related] GLIPIZIDE is contraindicated but no substitution found.
  • dIntensify choices II
    • dIncrease dose preferred(strict rule-in condition there exists non-contraindicated meds not at max level according to DM guideline evaluate to true )])
      • Evaluate_Increase_Activity_Intensity consider increasing dose of drugs
  • dNo Incr dose choice
null

ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard

KB loaded from /Users/tu/Documents/Dropbox/VA/ATHENA/athenakbs/ATHENA_DM_GlycemicControl_Dashboard.pprj(last modified: 05/31/2018)

Patient classification:
  • ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard: true[because Eligibility criteria evaluate to true(Age(65.0:01/01/1970) && NOT (Pres of DM-1 and Abs of DM-2) && Age(65.0:01/01/1970))]
Scenario choice: Scenario on One or Two encoded drugs not insulin

Goal: HbA1c <= 9%(Presence of HbA1c)

Reached goal? failed(HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))

Action Choices

  • dAll CDS scenarios No ACE/ARB
    • Metformin checks preferred(rule in criterion Pres biguanide and not biguanide contraindicated evaluate to true because not biguanide contraindicated)])
      • [General_Info] Check B12 levels every 2 years as pt has Rx for metformin.
    • MPR checks preferred(rule in criterion Presence of DM guideline med with 0.0 < MPR < 0.9 evaluate to true because Medication(70.0,70.0,METFORMIN))])
      • [Primary_Recommendation] METFORMIN (MPR= 70.0 %). Discuss with pt.
    • Msg start Insulin preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.
    • Set target HbA1c 2017 preferred(rule in criterion Absence Target HBA1c evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Refer to Table 2 from VA 2017 DM Guidelines to determine HbA1c target.
    • Shared Decision Making Action preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Strongly recommend shared decision making process, where pt, family and provider agree to plan of care and treatment. Info available here.
    • TLC preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Lifestyle changes to control DM. Info available here.
  • dTwo drug choices II
    • Make rec's preferred(strict rule-in condition not at goal and not bad TZD and gemfibrozil evaluate to true because HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013) && NOT (Pres gemfibrozil and TZD and not TZD contra))])
  • Can Intensify or Sub
    • dIntensify II preferred(strict rule-in condition true evaluate to true )])
  • dIntensify choices II
    • dIncrease dose preferred(strict rule-in condition there exists non-contraindicated meds not at max level according to DM guideline evaluate to true )])
      • Evaluate_Increase_Activity_Intensity consider increasing dose of drugs
  • dNo Incr dose choice
    • Msg follow up 3 months incr dose preferred(strict rule-in condition Pres non-insulin agent rec incr or block incr evaluate to true )])
      • [Follow_Up] Follow up in 3 months
If changing attribute, consider:
  • GLIPIZIDE(change daily_dose: up to High_Dose(high/low)
    • preferred
    • fine-grained priority: 300
    )

Patient classification:
  • ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard: true[because Eligibility criteria evaluate to true(Age(65.0:01/01/1970) && NOT (Pres of DM-1 and Abs of DM-2) && Age(65.0:01/01/1970))]

Goal: HbA1c <= 9%(Presence of HbA1c)

Reached goal? failed(HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))

Action Choices

  • dAll CDS scenarios No ACE/ARB
    • Metformin checks preferred(rule in criterion Pres biguanide and not biguanide contraindicated evaluate to true because not biguanide contraindicated)])
      • [General_Info] Check B12 levels every 2 years as pt has Rx for metformin.
      • [Primary_Recommendation] GFR 44.0 (2013/6/11). Assess risk with metformin.
    • Msg start Insulin preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.
    • Set target HbA1c 2017 preferred(rule in criterion Absence Target HBA1c evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Refer to Table 2 from VA 2017 DM Guidelines to determine HbA1c target.
    • Shared Decision Making Action preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Strongly recommend shared decision making process, where pt, family and provider agree to plan of care and treatment. Info available here.
    • TLC preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Lifestyle changes to control DM. Info available here.
  • dTwo drug choices II
    • Make rec's preferred(strict rule-in condition not at goal and not bad TZD and gemfibrozil evaluate to true because HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013) && NOT (Pres gemfibrozil and TZD and not TZD contra))])
  • Can Intensify or Sub
    • dIntensify II preferred(strict rule-in condition true evaluate to true )])
  • dIntensify choices II
    • dIncrease dose preferred(strict rule-in condition there exists non-contraindicated meds not at max level according to DM guideline evaluate to true )])
      • Evaluate_Increase_Activity_Intensity consider increasing dose of drugs
  • dNo Incr dose choice
    • dNo incr dose preferred(strict rule-in condition Absence DM med rec inc and incr blocked evaluate to true because NOT contraindication to non insulin agent)])
      • [Drug_Related] Not able to increase METFORMIN. Adding another DM med.
  • dCannot Increase dose choices
    • Rec 1st and 2nd line preferred(strict rule-in condition 1 or 2 DM ecoded meds evaluate to true because not 3+ encoded DM medsEncoded DM Drugs(2) && Encoded DM Drugs(2))])
      • Evaluate_Start_Activity Evaluate start 1st and and 2nd line
      • Evaluate_Start_Activity Initiate empa
  • No meds, No recs
    • d3rd line therapy preferred(strict rule-in condition Absence of oral hypoglycemic agent rec add AND blocked add evaluate to true )])
      • [Drug_Related] Cannot recommend metformin, glipizide, pioglitazone, saxagliptin or, if CVD present, empaglifozin. Please consider other drugs from Appendix B of the VA 2017 DM Guidelines .
      • [Follow_Up] Follow up in 3 months
Considerations for adding drug:
  • Thiazolidinediones
    • preferred drug: Pioglitazone
    • preference: neutral
    • fine-grained priority: 0
    • No comment
  • Saxagliptin
    • Relative contraindications: eGFR<45 most recent any time frame([eGFR(44.0:06/11/2013)])
    • preference: neutral
    • fine-grained priority: 0
  • Biguanide
    • preferred drug: Metformin
    • Already being used
    • Do not add uncontrollable conditions: 30<=eGFR<45 in past 30 days([eGFR(44.0:06/11/2013) && eGFR(44.0:06/11/2013)])
    • preference: ruled out
    • fine-grained priority: 0
  • Glipizide
    • preferred drug: Glipizide
    • Already being used
    • preference: ruled out
    • fine-grained priority: 0
Considerations for adding drug:
  • Empagliflozin
    • Contraindications: Abs Empa and eGFR<45 past 30 days([eGFR(44.0:06/11/2013)])
    • Relative indications: CVD DM(CVD_DM)
    • preference: ruled out
    • fine-grained priority: 200

 Message: Msg Start insulin

 Message: If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.
 Message: Set target HbA1c 2017

Therapeutic Choices


Drug Action Type: increase_dose
Preference: blocked
Fine-grain Priority: 300
Specific Drug: PIOGLITAZONE
do_not_intensify_condition: Absence of AST or ALT in past year
Collateral Actions: 
      Order_TestProcedure: Order AST - missing in past year
      Test or Procedure: AST
      Order_TestProcedure: Order ALT - missing in past year
      Test or Procedure: ALT
      Message: TZD incr missing AST or ALT
      Message Type: do_not_intensify_controllable_condition
      Message: Would recommend increasing thiazolidinedione but missing AST or ALT.

ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard

KB loaded from /Users/tu/Documents/Dropbox/VA/ATHENA/athenakbs/ATHENA_DM_GlycemicControl_Dashboard.pprj(last modified: 05/31/2018)

Patient classification:
  • ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard: true[because Eligibility criteria evaluate to true(Age(65.0:01/01/1970) && NOT (Pres of DM-1 and Abs of DM-2) && Age(65.0:01/01/1970))]
Scenario choice: Scenario on One or Two encoded drugs not insulin

Goal: HbA1c <= 9%(Presence of HbA1c)

Reached goal? failed(HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))

Action Choices

  • dAll CDS scenarios No ACE/ARB
    • Metformin checks preferred(rule in criterion Pres biguanide and not biguanide contraindicated evaluate to true because not biguanide contraindicated)])
      • [General_Info] Check B12 levels every 2 years as pt has Rx for metformin.
    • MPR checks preferred(rule in criterion Presence of DM guideline med with 0.0 < MPR < 0.9 evaluate to true because Medication(70.0,70.0,METFORMIN))])
      • [Primary_Recommendation] METFORMIN (MPR= 70.0 %). Discuss with pt.
    • Msg start Insulin preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.
    • Set target HbA1c 2017 preferred(rule in criterion Absence Target HBA1c evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Refer to Table 2 from VA 2017 DM Guidelines to determine HbA1c target.
    • Shared Decision Making Action preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Strongly recommend shared decision making process, where pt, family and provider agree to plan of care and treatment. Info available here.
    • TLC preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Lifestyle changes to control DM. Info available here.
  • dTwo drug choices II
    • Make rec's preferred(strict rule-in condition not at goal and not bad TZD and gemfibrozil evaluate to true because HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013) && NOT (Pres gemfibrozil and TZD and not TZD contra))])
  • Can Intensify or Sub
    • dIntensify II preferred(strict rule-in condition true evaluate to true )])
  • dIntensify choices II
    • dIncrease dose preferred(strict rule-in condition there exists non-contraindicated meds not at max level according to DM guideline evaluate to true )])
      • Evaluate_Increase_Activity_Intensity consider increasing dose of drugs
  • dNo Incr dose choice
    • Msg follow up 3 months incr dose preferred(strict rule-in condition Pres non-insulin agent rec incr or block incr evaluate to true )])
      • [Follow_Up] Follow up in 3 months
If changing attribute, consider:
  • METFORMIN(change daily_dose: up to High_Dose(high/low)
    • preferred
    • fine-grained priority: 300
    )
  • GLIPIZIDE(change daily_dose: up to High_Dose(high/low)
    • preferred
    • fine-grained priority: 300
    )
null

Patient classification:
  • ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard: true[because Eligibility criteria evaluate to true(Age(65.0:01/01/1970) && NOT (Pres of DM-1 and Abs of DM-2) && Age(65.0:01/01/1970))]

Action Choices

  • dAll CDS scenarios No ACE/ARB
    • Metformin checks preferred(rule in criterion Pres biguanide and not biguanide contraindicated evaluate to true because not biguanide contraindicated)])
      • [General_Info] Check B12 levels every 2 years as pt has Rx for metformin.
      • [General_Info] Rx for metformin. Check GFR annually.

      • [General_Info] If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.

      • [General_Info] Refer to Table 2 from VA 2017 DM Guidelines to determine HbA1c target.
    • Shared Decision Making Action preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Strongly recommend shared decision making process, where pt, family and provider agree to plan of care and treatment. Info available here.
    • TLC preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Lifestyle changes to control DM. Info available here.
  • dTwo drug choices II
    • Make rec's preferred(strict rule-in condition not at goal and not bad TZD and gemfibrozil evaluate to true because HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013) && NOT (Pres gemfibrozil and TZD and not TZD contra))])
  • Can Intensify or Sub
    • dIntensify II preferred(strict rule-in condition true evaluate to true )])
  • dIntensify choices II
    • dIncrease dose preferred(strict rule-in condition there exists non-contraindicated meds not at max level according to DM guideline evaluate to true )])
      • Evaluate_Increase_Activity_Intensity consider increasing dose of drugs
  • dNo Incr dose choice

    • Metformin checks preferred(rule in criterion Pres biguanide and not biguanide contraindicated evaluate to true because not biguanide contraindicated)])
      • [General_Info] Check B12 levels every 2 years as pt has Rx for metformin.
      • [Primary_Recommendation] GFR 40.0 (2013/6/11). Assess risk with metformin.
    • Msg start Insulin preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.
    • Set target HbA1c 2017 preferred(rule in criterion Absence Target HBA1c evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Refer to Table 2 from VA 2017 DM Guidelines to determine HbA1c target.

      • [General_Info] Strongly recommend shared decision making process, where pt, family and provider agree to plan of care and treatment. Info available here.

      • [General_Info] Lifestyle changes to control DM. Info available here.

    • dIntensify II preferred(strict rule-in condition true evaluate to true )])
    • dSubstitute preferred(strict rule-in condition Presence of contraindication and no bad drug partner DM evaluate to true )])
      • Evaluate_Substitution_Activity dEvaluate substitution first line agent
  • dIntensify choices II
    • dIncrease dose preferred(strict rule-in condition there exists non-contraindicated meds not at max level according to DM guideline evaluate to true )])
      • Evaluate_Increase_Activity_Intensity consider increasing dose of drugs
  • No 1st or 2nd ine drug rec sub
    • Link to alternalternative sub preferred(strict rule-in condition Absence of oral hypoglycemic agent rec add AND blocked add evaluate to true )])
      • [Drug_Related] Cannot recommend metformin, glipizide, pioglitazone, saxagliptin or, if CVD present, empaglifozin. Please consider other drugs from Appendix B of the VA 2017 DM Guidelines .
      • [Drug_Related] GLIPIZIDE is contraindicated but no substitution found.
  • dNo Incr dose choice

ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard

KB loaded from /Users/tu/Documents/Dropbox/VA/ATHENA/athenakbs/ATHENA_DM_GlycemicControl_Dashboard.pprj(last modified: 05/31/2018)

Patient classification:
  • ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard: true[because Eligibility criteria evaluate to true(Age(65.0:01/01/1970) && NOT (Pres of DM-1 and Abs of DM-2) && Age(65.0:01/01/1970))]
Scenario choice: Scenario on One or Two encoded drugs not insulin

Goal: HbA1c <= 9%(Presence of HbA1c)

Reached goal? failed(HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))

Action Choices

  • dAll CDS scenarios No ACE/ARB
    • Metformin checks preferred(rule in criterion Pres biguanide and not biguanide contraindicated evaluate to true because not biguanide contraindicated)])
      • [General_Info] Check B12 levels every 2 years as pt has Rx for metformin.
      • [General_Info] Rx for metformin. Check GFR annually.
    • Msg start Insulin preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.
    • Set target HbA1c 2017 preferred(rule in criterion Absence Target HBA1c evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Refer to Table 2 from VA 2017 DM Guidelines to determine HbA1c target.
    • Shared Decision Making Action preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Strongly recommend shared decision making process, where pt, family and provider agree to plan of care and treatment. Info available here.
    • TLC preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Lifestyle changes to control DM. Info available here.
  • dTwo drug choices II
    • Make rec's preferred(strict rule-in condition not at goal and not bad TZD and gemfibrozil evaluate to true because HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013) && NOT (Pres gemfibrozil and TZD and not TZD contra))])
  • Can Intensify or Sub
    • dIntensify II preferred(strict rule-in condition true evaluate to true )])
    • dSubstitute preferred(strict rule-in condition Presence of contraindication and no bad drug partner DM evaluate to true )])
      • Evaluate_Substitution_Activity dEvaluate substitution first line agent
  • No 1st or 2nd ine drug rec sub
    • Link to alternalternative sub preferred(strict rule-in condition Absence of oral hypoglycemic agent rec add AND blocked add evaluate to true )])
      • [Drug_Related] Cannot recommend metformin, glipizide, pioglitazone, saxagliptin or, if CVD present, empaglifozin. Please consider other drugs from Appendix B of the VA 2017 DM Guidelines .
      • [Drug_Related] GLIPIZIDE is contraindicated but no substitution found.
  • dIntensify choices II
    • dIncrease dose preferred(strict rule-in condition there exists non-contraindicated meds not at max level according to DM guideline evaluate to true )])
      • Evaluate_Increase_Activity_Intensity consider increasing dose of drugs
  • dNo Incr dose choice
    • Msg follow up 3 months incr dose preferred(strict rule-in condition Pres non-insulin agent rec incr or block incr evaluate to true )])
      • [Follow_Up] Follow up in 3 months
If changing attribute, consider:
  • METFORMIN(change daily_dose: up to High_Dose(high/low)
    • blocked
    • do not intensify conditions: Absence of eGFR in past year()
    • fine-grained priority: 300
    )
    • Order test or procedure:eGFR
    • [do_not_intensify_controllable_condition] Cannot recommend increasing metformin when GFR < 45 and old: 40.0 (2011/6/11)

KB loaded from /Users/tu/Documents/Dropbox/VA/ATHENA/athenakbs/ATHENA_DM_GlycemicControl_Dashboard.pprj(last modified: 05/31/2018)

Patient classification:
  • ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard: true[because Eligibility criteria evaluate to true(Age(65.0:01/01/1970) && NOT (Pres of DM-1 and Abs of DM-2) && Age(65.0:01/01/1970))]
Scenario choice: Scenario on One or Two encoded drugs not insulin

Goal: HbA1c <= 9%(Presence of HbA1c)

Reached goal? failed(HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))

Action Choices

  • dAll CDS scenarios No ACE/ARB
    • Metformin checks preferred(rule in criterion Pres biguanide and not biguanide contraindicated evaluate to true because not biguanide contraindicated)])
      • [General_Info] Check B12 levels every 2 years as pt has Rx for metformin.
    • MPR checks preferred(rule in criterion Presence of DM guideline med with 0.0 < MPR < 0.9 evaluate to true because Medication(70.0,70.0,METFORMIN))])
      • [Primary_Recommendation] METFORMIN (MPR= 70.0 %). Discuss with pt.
    • Msg start Insulin preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.
    • Set target HbA1c 2017 preferred(rule in criterion Absence Target HBA1c evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Refer to Table 2 from VA 2017 DM Guidelines to determine HbA1c target.
    • Shared Decision Making Action preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Strongly recommend shared decision making process, where pt, family and provider agree to plan of care and treatment. Info available here.
    • TLC preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Lifestyle changes to control DM. Info available here.
  • dTwo drug choices II
    • Make rec's preferred(strict rule-in condition not at goal and not bad TZD and gemfibrozil evaluate to true because HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013) && NOT (Pres gemfibrozil and TZD and not TZD contra))])
  • Can Intensify or Sub
    • dIntensify II preferred(strict rule-in condition true evaluate to true )])
  • dIntensify choices II
    • dIncrease dose preferred(strict rule-in condition there exists non-contraindicated meds not at max level according to DM guideline evaluate to true )])
      • Evaluate_Increase_Activity_Intensity consider increasing dose of drugs
  • dNo Incr dose choice
    • dNo incr dose preferred(strict rule-in condition Absence DM med rec inc and incr blocked evaluate to true because NOT contraindication to non insulin agent)])
      • [Drug_Related] Not able to increase METFORMIN. Adding another DM med.
  • dCannot Increase dose choices
    • Rec 1st and 2nd line preferred(strict rule-in condition 1 or 2 DM ecoded meds evaluate to true because not 3+ encoded DM medsEncoded DM Drugs(1) && Encoded DM Drugs(1))])
      • Evaluate_Start_Activity Evaluate start 1st and and 2nd line
  • No meds, No recs
    • d3rd line therapy preferred(strict rule-in condition Absence of oral hypoglycemic agent rec add AND blocked add evaluate to true )])
      • [Drug_Related] Cannot recommend metformin, glipizide, pioglitazone, saxagliptin or, if CVD present, empaglifozin. Please consider other drugs from Appendix B of the VA 2017 DM Guidelines .
      • [Follow_Up] Follow up in 3 months
Considerations for adding drug:

    • fine-grained priority: 0

    • fine-grained priority: 0

    • fine-grained priority: 0

ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard

KB loaded from /Users/tu/Documents/Dropbox/VA/ATHENA/athenakbs/ATHENA_DM_GlycemicControl_Dashboard.pprj(last modified: 05/31/2018)

Patient classification:
  • ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard: true[because Eligibility criteria evaluate to true(Age(65.0:01/01/1970) && NOT (Pres of DM-1 and Abs of DM-2) && Age(65.0:01/01/1970))]
Scenario choice: Scenario on One or Two encoded drugs not insulin

Goal: HbA1c <= 9%(Presence of HbA1c)

Reached goal? failed(HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))

Action Choices

  • dAll CDS scenarios No ACE/ARB
    • Msg start Insulin preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.
    • Set target HbA1c 2017 preferred(rule in criterion Absence Target HBA1c evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Refer to Table 2 from VA 2017 DM Guidelines to determine HbA1c target.
    • Shared Decision Making Action preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Strongly recommend shared decision making process, where pt, family and provider agree to plan of care and treatment. Info available here.
    • TLC preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Lifestyle changes to control DM. Info available here.
  • dTwo drug choices II
    • Make rec's preferred(strict rule-in condition not at goal and not bad TZD and gemfibrozil evaluate to true because HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013) && NOT (Pres gemfibrozil and TZD and not TZD contra))])
  • Can Intensify or Sub
    • dIntensify II preferred(strict rule-in condition true evaluate to true )])
    • dSubstitute preferred(strict rule-in condition Presence of contraindication and no bad drug partner DM evaluate to true )])
      • Evaluate_Substitution_Activity dEvaluate substitution first line agent
  • dIntensify choices II
  • No 1st or 2nd ine drug rec sub
    • Link to alternalternative sub preferred(strict rule-in condition Absence of oral hypoglycemic agent rec add AND blocked add evaluate to true )])
      • [Drug_Related] Cannot recommend metformin, glipizide, pioglitazone, saxagliptin or, if CVD present, empaglifozin. Please consider other drugs from Appendix B of the VA 2017 DM Guidelines .
      • [Drug_Related] GLIPIZIDE is contraindicated but no substitution found.

ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard

Patient classification:
  • ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard: true[because Eligibility criteria evaluate to true(Age(65.0:01/01/1970) && NOT (Pres of DM-1 and Abs of DM-2) && Age(65.0:01/01/1970))]
Scenario choice: Scenario:Nonpharmacologic Therapy

Goal: HbA1c <= 9%(Presence of HbA1c)

Reached goal? failed(HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))

Action Choices

  • dAll CDS scenarios No ACE/ARB
    • Msg start Insulin preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.
    • Set target HbA1c 2017 preferred(rule in criterion Absence Target HBA1c evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Refer to Table 2 from VA 2017 DM Guidelines to determine HbA1c target.
    • Shared Decision Making Action preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Strongly recommend shared decision making process, where pt, family and provider agree to plan of care and treatment. Info available here.
    • TLC preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Lifestyle changes to control DM. Info available here.
  • dNonPharm Choices II
    • Rec 1st line preferred(strict rule-in condition dashboard goal not satisfied evaluate to true because dashboard goal not satisfiedHbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))])
      • Evaluate_Start_Activity Evaluate start Biguanide
  • No MF
    • No meds Rec rest preferred(strict rule-in condition Abs biguanide rec add and blocked add evaluate to true )])
      • Evaluate_Start_Activity Initiate glip, Saxa, TZD
      • Evaluate_Start_Activity Initiate empa
  • No meds, No recs
    • Msg F/U preferred(strict rule-in condition Presence of non-insulin agent rec add or blocked evaluate to true )])
      • [Follow_Up] Follow up in 3 months.
Considerations for adding drug:
  • Biguanide
    • preferred drug: Metformin
    • Contraindications: Poor renal function and Abs Biguanide([Sex(Male compared to Male) && null; 2.5>=2.5)])
    • Do not add controllable conditions: Absence of eGFR in past 30 days()
    • preference: ruled out
    • fine-grained priority: 200
Considerations for adding drug:
  • Saxagliptin
    • Contraindications: Pancreatitis(Pancreatitis)
    • Do not add controllable conditions: Absence of eGFR in past 30 days()
    • preference: ruled out
    • fine-grained priority: 200
  • Thiazolidinediones
    • preferred drug: Pioglitazone
    • Contraindications: Bladder Cancer(Bladder_Cancer)
    • preference: ruled out
    • fine-grained priority: 200
  • Glipizide
    • preferred drug: Glipizide
    • Contraindications: ADR anaphylaxis to glipizide([Adverse_Reaction(Anaphylaxis)]) ADR anggioedema or anaphylaxis or stevens johns to glimepiride([Adverse_Reaction(GLIMEPIRIDE)]) ADR anapylaxis to glimepiride([Adverse_Reaction(Anaphylaxis,GLIMEPIRIDE)])
    • Adverse reaction: GLIPIZIDE(Anaphylaxis), GLIMEPIRIDE(Anaphylaxis)
    • preference: ruled out
    • fine-grained priority: 200
Considerations for adding drug:
  • Empagliflozin
    • Relative indications: CVD DM(CVD_DM)
    • Do not add controllable conditions: Absence of eGFR in past 30 days()
    • preference: blocked
    • fine-grained priority: 200
      • [do_not_add_controllable_condition] Would add empa, but missing GFR.
      • Order test or procedure:eGFR

  • ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard: true[because Eligibility criteria evaluate to true(Age(65.0:01/01/1970) && NOT (Pres of DM-1 and Abs of DM-2) && Age(65.0:01/01/1970))]

  • dAll CDS scenarios No ACE/ARB
    • Msg start Insulin preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.
    • Set target HbA1c 2017 preferred(rule in criterion Absence Target HBA1c evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Refer to Table 2 from VA 2017 DM Guidelines to determine HbA1c target.
    • Shared Decision Making Action preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Strongly recommend shared decision making process, where pt, family and provider agree to plan of care and treatment. Info available here.
    • TLC preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Lifestyle changes to control DM. Info available here.
  • dNonPharm Choices II
    • Rec 1st line preferred(strict rule-in condition dashboard goal not satisfied evaluate to true because dashboard goal not satisfiedHbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))])
      • Evaluate_Start_Activity Evaluate start Biguanide
  • No MF
    • No meds Rec rest preferred(strict rule-in condition Abs biguanide rec add and blocked add evaluate to true )])
      • Evaluate_Start_Activity Initiate glip, Saxa, TZD
  • No meds, No recs
    • d3rd line therapy preferred(strict rule-in condition Absence of oral hypoglycemic agent rec add AND blocked add evaluate to true )])
      • [Drug_Related] Cannot recommend metformin, glipizide, pioglitazone, saxagliptin or, if CVD present, empaglifozin. Please consider other drugs from Appendix B of the VA 2017 DM Guidelines .
      • [Follow_Up] Follow up in 3 months
Considerations for adding drug:
  • Biguanide
    • preferred drug: Metformin
    • Contraindications: ADR renal failure or impairment to MF or MF_ER([Adverse_Reaction()])
    • Adverse reaction: METFORMIN_ER(renalImpairment)
    • preference: ruled out
    • fine-grained priority: 200
Considerations for adding drug:
  • Saxagliptin
    • preference: neutral
    • fine-grained priority: 200
    • No comment
  • Thiazolidinediones
    • preferred drug: Pioglitazone
    • Contraindications: ADR of thrombocytopenia to pio or rosi([Adverse_Reaction(Thrombocytopenia)])
    • Adverse reaction: ROSIGLITAZONE(Thrombocytopenia)
    • preference: ruled out
    • fine-grained priority: 200
  • Glipizide
    • preferred drug: Glipizide
    • Contraindications: ADR cardiac arrest or coma or thrombocytopenia or renal failure or renal impairment to glip, glyb, glim, first gen SU, sulfa([Adverse_Reaction()])
    • Adverse reaction: CHLORPROPAMIDE(COMA), CHLORPROPAMIDE(COMA)
    • preference: ruled out
    • fine-grained priority: 200

Reached goal? achieved(HbA1c(6.5:06/11/2013))

Action Choices

  • dAll CDS scenarios No ACE/ARB
    • Metformin checks preferred(rule in criterion Pres biguanide and not biguanide contraindicated evaluate to true because not biguanide contraindicated)])
      • [General_Info] Check B12 levels every 2 years as pt has Rx for metformin.
    • MPR checks preferred(rule in criterion Presence of DM guideline med with 0.0 < MPR < 0.9 evaluate to true because Medication(70.0,70.0,METFORMIN))])
      • [Primary_Recommendation] METFORMIN (MPR= 70.0 %). Discuss with pt.
    • Msg start Insulin preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.
    • Set target HbA1c 2017 preferred(rule in criterion Absence Target HBA1c evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Refer to Table 2 from VA 2017 DM Guidelines to determine HbA1c target.
    • Shared Decision Making Action preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Strongly recommend shared decision making process, where pt, family and provider agree to plan of care and treatment. Info available here.
    • TLC preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Lifestyle changes to control DM. Info available here.
  • dTwo drug choices II
    • dLow HbA1c Alert preferred(strict rule-in condition HbA1c<7 OR Glycohem<9 evaluate to true because HbA1c(6.5:06/11/2013))])
      • [Primary_Recommendation] ALERT: low HbA1c and at high risk for cardiovascular event and hypoglycemia.
    • dHbA1c or GlycoHem controlled preferred(strict rule-in condition HbA1c<=9 OR Glycohemoglobin<=11 evaluate to true because HbA1c(6.5:06/11/2013))])
      • [Primary_Recommendation] HbA1c <=9, meets goal. Congratulations!

ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard

KB loaded from /Users/tu/Documents/Dropbox/VA/ATHENA/athenakbs/ATHENA_DM_GlycemicControl_Dashboard.pprj(last modified: 05/31/2018)

Patient classification:
  • ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard: true[because Eligibility criteria evaluate to true(Age(65.0:01/01/1970) && NOT (Pres of DM-1 and Abs of DM-2) && Age(65.0:01/01/1970))]
Scenario choice: Scenario:Nonpharmacologic Therapy

Goal: HbA1c <= 9%(Presence of HbA1c)

Reached goal? failed(HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))

Action Choices

  • dAll CDS scenarios No ACE/ARB
    • Msg start Insulin preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.
    • Set target HbA1c 2017 preferred(rule in criterion Absence Target HBA1c evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Refer to Table 2 from VA 2017 DM Guidelines to determine HbA1c target.
    • Shared Decision Making Action preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Strongly recommend shared decision making process, where pt, family and provider agree to plan of care and treatment. Info available here.
    • TLC preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Lifestyle changes to control DM. Info available here.
  • dNonPharm Choices II
    • Rec 1st line preferred(strict rule-in condition dashboard goal not satisfied evaluate to true because dashboard goal not satisfiedHbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))])
      • Evaluate_Start_Activity Evaluate start Biguanide
  • No MF
    • No meds Rec rest preferred(strict rule-in condition Abs biguanide rec add and blocked add evaluate to true )])
      • Evaluate_Start_Activity Initiate glip, Saxa, TZD
  • No meds, No recs
    • d3rd line therapy preferred(strict rule-in condition Absence of oral hypoglycemic agent rec add AND blocked add evaluate to true )])
      • [Drug_Related] Cannot recommend metformin, glipizide, pioglitazone, saxagliptin or, if CVD present, empaglifozin. Please consider other drugs from Appendix B of the VA 2017 DM Guidelines .
      • [Follow_Up] Follow up in 3 months
Considerations for adding drug:
  • Biguanide
    • preferred drug: Metformin
    • Do not add controllable conditions: Absence of AST or ALT in past year([])
    • preference: neutral
    • fine-grained priority: 200
Considerations for adding drug:
  • Glipizide
    • preferred drug: Glipizide
    • preference: neutral
    • fine-grained priority: 200
    • No comment
  • Saxagliptin
    • preference: neutral
    • fine-grained priority: 200
    • No comment
  • Thiazolidinediones
    • preferred drug: Pioglitazone
    • Do not add controllable conditions: Absence of AST or ALT in past year([])
    • preference: neutral
    • fine-grained priority: 200
null

Session time: 2013-07-3

GuidelineID: ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard

System Conclusions

Conclusion: ATHENA DM:  Glycemic Control Dashboard Value: true
Case is eligible

Guideline Goal: HbA1c <= 9% (Presence of HbA1c)

Reached goal? failed(HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))

Recommended Actions

 Message: Msg Start insulin
 Message Type: General_Info
 Message: If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.
 Message: Set target HbA1c 2017
 Message Type: General_Info
 Message: Refer to   Table 2 from VA 2017 DM Guidelines  to determine HbA1c target.
 Message: Shared Decision Making Msg
 Message Type: General_Info
 Message: Strongly recommend shared decision making process, where pt, family and provider agree to plan of care and treatment. Info available  here.
 Message: TLC
 Message Type: General_Info
 Message: Lifestyle changes to control DM.  Info available  here.
 Evaluate_Start_Activity: Evaluate start Biguanide
 Evaluate_Start_Activity: Initiate glip, Saxa, TZD
 Message: Msg No recs; Link to other DM drugs
 Message Type: Drug_Related
 Message: Cannot recommend metformin, glipizide, pioglitazone, saxagliptin or, if CVD present, empaglifozin.  Please consider other   drugs from Appendix B of the VA 2017 DM Guidelines  .
 Message: Follow up in 3 months
 Message Type: Follow_Up
 Message: Follow up in 3 months

Therapeutic Choices


add: Biguanide(Metformin)
Preference: neutral
Fine-grain priority: 200
do_not_add_controllable_condition: Absence of AST or ALT in past year

add: Glipizide
Preference: neutral
Fine-grain priority: 200

add: Saxagliptin
Preference: neutral
Fine-grain priority: 200

add: Thiazolidinediones(Pioglitazone)
Preference: neutral
Fine-grain priority: 200
do_not_add_controllable_condition: Absence of AST or ALT in past year

Patient classification:
  • ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard: true[because Eligibility criteria evaluate to true(Age(65.0:01/01/1970) && NOT (Pres of DM-1 and Abs of DM-2) && Age(65.0:01/01/1970))]
Scenario choice: Scenario:Nonpharmacologic Therapy

Goal: HbA1c <= 9%(Presence of HbA1c)

Reached goal? failed(HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))

Action Choices

  • dAll CDS scenarios No ACE/ARB
    • Msg start Insulin preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.
    • Set target HbA1c 2017 preferred(rule in criterion Absence Target HBA1c evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Refer to Table 2 from VA 2017 DM Guidelines to determine HbA1c target.
    • Shared Decision Making Action preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Strongly recommend shared decision making process, where pt, family and provider agree to plan of care and treatment. Info available here.
    • TLC preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Lifestyle changes to control DM. Info available here.
  • dNonPharm Choices II
    • Rec 1st line preferred(strict rule-in condition dashboard goal not satisfied evaluate to true because dashboard goal not satisfiedHbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))])
      • Evaluate_Start_Activity Evaluate start Biguanide
  • No MF
    • No meds Rec rest preferred(strict rule-in condition Abs biguanide rec add and blocked add evaluate to true )])
      • Evaluate_Start_Activity Initiate glip, Saxa, TZD
  • No meds, No recs
    • d3rd line therapy preferred(strict rule-in condition Absence of oral hypoglycemic agent rec add AND blocked add evaluate to true )])
      • [Drug_Related] Cannot recommend metformin, glipizide, pioglitazone, saxagliptin or, if CVD present, empaglifozin. Please consider other drugs from Appendix B of the VA 2017 DM Guidelines .
      • [Follow_Up] Follow up in 3 months
Considerations for adding drug:
  • Biguanide
    • preferred drug: Metformin
    • Do not add controllable conditions: Absence of bicarbonate in past year([])
    • preference: neutral
    • fine-grained priority: 200

Patient classification:
  • ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard: true[because Eligibility criteria evaluate to true(Age(65.0:01/01/1970) && NOT (Pres of DM-1 and Abs of DM-2) && Age(65.0:01/01/1970))]

Goal: HbA1c <= 9%(Presence of HbA1c)

Reached goal? failed(HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))

Action Choices

  • dAll CDS scenarios No ACE/ARB
    • Msg start Insulin preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.
    • Set target HbA1c 2017 preferred(rule in criterion Absence Target HBA1c evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Refer to Table 2 from VA 2017 DM Guidelines to determine HbA1c target.
    • Shared Decision Making Action preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Strongly recommend shared decision making process, where pt, family and provider agree to plan of care and treatment. Info available here.
    • TLC preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Lifestyle changes to control DM. Info available here.
  • dNonPharm Choices II
    • Rec 1st line preferred(strict rule-in condition dashboard goal not satisfied evaluate to true because dashboard goal not satisfiedHbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))])
      • Evaluate_Start_Activity Evaluate start Biguanide
  • No MF
    • No meds Rec rest preferred(strict rule-in condition Abs biguanide rec add and blocked add evaluate to true )])
      • Evaluate_Start_Activity Initiate glip, Saxa, TZD
  • No meds, No recs
    • d3rd line therapy preferred(strict rule-in condition Absence of oral hypoglycemic agent rec add AND blocked add evaluate to true )])
      • [Drug_Related] Cannot recommend metformin, glipizide, pioglitazone, saxagliptin or, if CVD present, empaglifozin. Please consider other drugs from Appendix B of the VA 2017 DM Guidelines .
      • [Follow_Up] Follow up in 3 months
Considerations for adding drug:
  • Biguanide
    • preferred drug: Metformin
    • Do not add controllable conditions: Absence of eGFR in past 30 days() Absence of AST or ALT in past year([])
    • preference: neutral
    • fine-grained priority: 200

Case is eligible

Guideline Goal: HbA1c <= 9% (Presence of HbA1c)

Reached goal? failed(HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))

Recommended Actions

 Message: Msg Start insulin
 Message Type: General_Info
 Message: If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.
 Message: Set target HbA1c 2017
 Message Type: General_Info
 Message: Refer to   Table 2 from VA 2017 DM Guidelines  to determine HbA1c target.
 Message: Shared Decision Making Msg
 Message Type: General_Info
 Message: Strongly recommend shared decision making process, where pt, family and provider agree to plan of care and treatment. Info available  here.
 Message: TLC
 Message Type: General_Info
 Message: Lifestyle changes to control DM.  Info available  here.
 Evaluate_Start_Activity: Evaluate start Biguanide

 Message: Msg No recs; Link to other DM drugs
 Message Type: Drug_Related
 Message: Cannot recommend metformin, glipizide, pioglitazone, saxagliptin or, if CVD present, empaglifozin.  Please consider other   drugs from Appendix B of the VA 2017 DM Guidelines  .
 Message: Follow up in 3 months
 Message Type: Follow_Up
 Message: Follow up in 3 months

Therapeutic Choices


add: Biguanide(Metformin)
Preference: neutral
Fine-grain priority: 200
do_not_add_controllable_condition: Absence of eGFR in past 30 days, Absence of AST or ALT in past year

Preference: neutral
Fine-grain priority: 200

add: Thiazolidinediones(Pioglitazone)
Preference: neutral
Fine-grain priority: 200

  • ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard: true[because Eligibility criteria evaluate to true(Age(65.0:01/01/1970) && NOT (Pres of DM-1 and Abs of DM-2) && Age(65.0:01/01/1970))]
Scenario choice: Scenario:Nonpharmacologic Therapy

Goal: HbA1c <= 9%(Presence of HbA1c)

Reached goal? failed(HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))

Action Choices

  • dAll CDS scenarios No ACE/ARB
    • Msg start Insulin preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.
    • Set target HbA1c 2017 preferred(rule in criterion Absence Target HBA1c evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Refer to Table 2 from VA 2017 DM Guidelines to determine HbA1c target.
    • Shared Decision Making Action preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Strongly recommend shared decision making process, where pt, family and provider agree to plan of care and treatment. Info available here.
    • TLC preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Lifestyle changes to control DM. Info available here.
  • dNonPharm Choices II
    • Rec 1st line preferred(strict rule-in condition dashboard goal not satisfied evaluate to true because dashboard goal not satisfiedHbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))])
      • Evaluate_Start_Activity Evaluate start Biguanide
  • No MF
    • No meds Rec rest preferred(strict rule-in condition Abs biguanide rec add and blocked add evaluate to true )])
      • Evaluate_Start_Activity Initiate glip, Saxa, TZD
  • No meds, No recs
    • d3rd line therapy preferred(strict rule-in condition Absence of oral hypoglycemic agent rec add AND blocked add evaluate to true )])
      • [Drug_Related] Cannot recommend metformin, glipizide, pioglitazone, saxagliptin or, if CVD present, empaglifozin. Please consider other drugs from Appendix B of the VA 2017 DM Guidelines .
      • [Follow_Up] Follow up in 3 months
Considerations for adding drug:
  • Biguanide
    • preferred drug: Metformin
    • Do not add controllable conditions: Absence of eGFR in past 30 days() Absence of AST or ALT in past year([])
    • preference: neutral
    • fine-grained priority: 200
Considerations for adding drug:
  • Glipizide
    • preferred drug: Glipizide
    • preference: neutral
    • fine-grained priority: 200
    • No comment
  • Saxagliptin
    • Do not add controllable conditions: Absence of eGFR in past 30 days()

    • fine-grained priority: 200
  • Thiazolidinediones

Reached goal? failed(HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))

Recommended Actions

 Message Type: General_Info
 Message: If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.
 Message: Set target HbA1c 2017
 Message Type: General_Info
 Message: Refer to   Table 2 from VA 2017 DM Guidelines  to determine HbA1c target.
 Message: Shared Decision Making Msg
 Message Type: General_Info
 Message: Strongly recommend shared decision making process, where pt, family and provider agree to plan of care and treatment. Info available  here.
 Message: TLC
 Message Type: General_Info
 Message: Lifestyle changes to control DM.  Info available  here.
 Evaluate_Start_Activity: Evaluate start Biguanide
 Evaluate_Start_Activity: Initiate glip, Saxa, TZD
 Message: Msg No recs; Link to other DM drugs
 Message Type: Drug_Related
 Message: Cannot recommend metformin, glipizide, pioglitazone, saxagliptin or, if CVD present, empaglifozin.  Please consider other   drugs from Appendix B of the VA 2017 DM Guidelines  .
 Message: Follow up in 3 months
 Message Type: Follow_Up

ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard

KB loaded from /Users/tu/Documents/Dropbox/VA/ATHENA/athenakbs/ATHENA_DM_GlycemicControl_Dashboard.pprj(last modified: 05/31/2018)

Patient classification:
  • ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard: true[because Eligibility criteria evaluate to true(Age(65.0:01/01/1970) && NOT (Pres of DM-1 and Abs of DM-2) && Age(65.0:01/01/1970))]
Scenario choice: Scenario:Nonpharmacologic Therapy

Goal: HbA1c <= 9%(Presence of HbA1c)

Reached goal? failed(HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))

Action Choices

  • dAll CDS scenarios No ACE/ARB
    • Liver Enzyme ALERT preferred(rule in criterion AST or ALT > 3*UpperLimitOfNormal evaluate to true because AST(140.0:06/11/2013))])
      • [Primary_Recommendation] ALERT: AST elevated 140.0 (2013/6/11)
    • Msg start Insulin preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.
    • Set target HbA1c 2017 preferred(rule in criterion Absence Target HBA1c evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Refer to Table 2 from VA 2017 DM Guidelines to determine HbA1c target.
    • Shared Decision Making Action preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Strongly recommend shared decision making process, where pt, family and provider agree to plan of care and treatment. Info available here.
    • TLC preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Lifestyle changes to control DM. Info available here.
  • dNonPharm Choices II
    • Rec 1st line preferred(strict rule-in condition dashboard goal not satisfied evaluate to true because dashboard goal not satisfiedHbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))])
      • Evaluate_Start_Activity Evaluate start Biguanide
  • No MF
    • No meds Rec rest preferred(strict rule-in condition Abs biguanide rec add and blocked add evaluate to true )])
      • Evaluate_Start_Activity Initiate glip, Saxa, TZD
      • Evaluate_Start_Activity Initiate empa
  • No meds, No recs
    • Msg F/U preferred(strict rule-in condition Presence of non-insulin agent rec add or blocked evaluate to true )])
      • [Follow_Up] Follow up in 3 months.
Considerations for adding drug:
  • Biguanide
    • preferred drug: Metformin
    • Contraindications: ADR acidosis to MF or MF_ER([Adverse_Reaction(ACIDOSIS)])
    • Relative contraindications: AST >3*UpperLimitOfNormal([AST(140.0:06/11/2013)]) Absence Metformin and 45<=eGFR<60 in past month([eGFR(55.0:06/11/2013) && eGFR(55.0:06/11/2013)])
    • Adverse reaction: METFORMIN(ACIDOSIS)
    • preference: ruled out
    • fine-grained priority: 200

  • Glipizide
    • preferred drug: Glipizide
    • preference: neutral
    • fine-grained priority: 200

  • Saxagliptin
    • preference: neutral
    • fine-grained priority: 200

    • dThree+ encoded meds preferred(strict rule-in condition 3 or more encoded DM meds evaluate to true because Encoded DM Drugs(3))])
      • [Out_of_Scope] Pt has Rx for 3+ DM drugs: METFORMIN, GLIPIZIDE, PIOGLITAZONE and HbA1c > 9. Consider referral to DM care team.

KB loaded from /Users/tu/Documents/Dropbox/VA/ATHENA/athenakbs/ATHENA_DM_GlycemicControl_Dashboard.pprj(last modified: 05/31/2018)

Patient classification:
  • ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard: true[because Eligibility criteria evaluate to true(Age(65.0:01/01/1970) && NOT (Pres of DM-1 and Abs of DM-2) && Age(65.0:01/01/1970))]
Scenario choice: Scenario on One or Two encoded drugs not insulin

Goal: HbA1c <= 9%(Presence of HbA1c)

Reached goal? failed(HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))

Action Choices

  • dAll CDS scenarios No ACE/ARB
    • Metformin checks preferred(rule in criterion Pres biguanide and not biguanide contraindicated evaluate to true because not biguanide contraindicated)])
      • [General_Info] Check B12 levels every 2 years as pt has Rx for metformin.
    • Msg start Insulin preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.
    • Set target HbA1c 2017 preferred(rule in criterion Absence Target HBA1c evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Refer to Table 2 from VA 2017 DM Guidelines to determine HbA1c target.
    • Shared Decision Making Action preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Strongly recommend shared decision making process, where pt, family and provider agree to plan of care and treatment. Info available here.
    • TLC preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Lifestyle changes to control DM. Info available here.
  • dTwo drug choices II
    • Make rec's preferred(strict rule-in condition not at goal and not bad TZD and gemfibrozil evaluate to true because HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013) && NOT (Pres gemfibrozil and TZD and not TZD contra))])
  • Can Intensify or Sub
    • dIntensify II preferred(strict rule-in condition true evaluate to true )])
  • dIntensify choices II
    • dCannot Increase dose preferred(strict rule-in condition drug at max dose and not contraindicated evaluate to true because drug at max dose && NOT contraindication to non insulin agent)])
  • dCannot Increase dose choices
    • Rec 1st and 2nd line preferred(strict rule-in condition 1 or 2 DM ecoded meds evaluate to true because not 3+ encoded DM medsEncoded DM Drugs(2) && Encoded DM Drugs(2))])
      • Evaluate_Start_Activity Evaluate start 1st and and 2nd line
  • No meds, No recs
    • d3rd line therapy preferred(strict rule-in condition Absence of oral hypoglycemic agent rec add AND blocked add evaluate to true )])
      • [Drug_Related] Cannot recommend metformin, glipizide, pioglitazone, saxagliptin or, if CVD present, empaglifozin. Please consider other drugs from Appendix B of the VA 2017 DM Guidelines .
      • [Follow_Up] Follow up in 3 months
Considerations for adding drug:

    • preferred drug: Pioglitazone
    • preference: neutral
    • fine-grained priority: 0

Patient classification:
  • ATHENA DM: Glycemic Control Dashboard: true[because Eligibility criteria evaluate to true(Age(65.0:01/01/1970) && NOT (Pres of DM-1 and Abs of DM-2) && Age(65.0:01/01/1970))]
Scenario choice: Scenario on One or Two encoded drugs not insulin

Goal: HbA1c <= 9%(Presence of HbA1c)

Reached goal? failed(HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))

Action Choices

  • dAll CDS scenarios No ACE/ARB
    • Metformin checks preferred(rule in criterion Pres biguanide and not biguanide contraindicated evaluate to true because not biguanide contraindicated)])
      • [General_Info] Check B12 levels every 2 years as pt has Rx for metformin.
      • [Primary_Recommendation] GFR 44.0 (2013/6/11). Assess risk with metformin.
    • Msg start Insulin preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.
    • Set target HbA1c 2017 preferred(rule in criterion Absence Target HBA1c evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Refer to Table 2 from VA 2017 DM Guidelines to determine HbA1c target.
    • Shared Decision Making Action preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Strongly recommend shared decision making process, where pt, family and provider agree to plan of care and treatment. Info available here.
    • TLC preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Lifestyle changes to control DM. Info available here.
  • dTwo drug choices II
    • dBad Drug partner DM drug II no contra preferred(strict rule-in condition Pres encoded DM med bad drug partner and that DM med not contra evaluate to true because Biguanide(2) && Metformin NOT contraindicatednull)])
      • [Drug_Related] Stop metformin or metforminXL
    • Make rec's preferred(strict rule-in condition not at goal and not bad TZD and gemfibrozil evaluate to true because HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013) && NOT (Pres gemfibrozil and TZD and not TZD contra))])
  • Can Intensify or Sub
    • dIntensify II preferred(strict rule-in condition true evaluate to true )])
  • dIntensify choices II
    • dIncrease dose preferred(strict rule-in condition there exists non-contraindicated meds not at max level according to DM guideline evaluate to true )])
      • Evaluate_Increase_Activity_Intensity consider increasing dose of drugs
  • dNo Incr dose choice
    • dNo incr dose preferred(strict rule-in condition Absence DM med rec inc and incr blocked evaluate to true because NOT contraindication to non insulin agent)])
      • [Drug_Related] Not able to increase METFORMIN, METFORMIN_ER. Adding another DM med.
  • dCannot Increase dose choices
    • Rec 1st and 2nd line preferred(strict rule-in condition 1 or 2 DM ecoded meds evaluate to true because not 3+ encoded DM medsEncoded DM Drugs(2) && Encoded DM Drugs(2))])
      • Evaluate_Start_Activity Evaluate start 1st and and 2nd line
  • No meds, No recs
    • d3rd line therapy preferred(strict rule-in condition Absence of oral hypoglycemic agent rec add AND blocked add evaluate to true )])
      • [Drug_Related] Cannot recommend metformin, glipizide, pioglitazone, saxagliptin or, if CVD present, empaglifozin. Please consider other drugs from Appendix B of the VA 2017 DM Guidelines .
      • [Follow_Up] Follow up in 3 months

    • fine-grained priority: 0

  • Glipizide

    • fine-grained priority: 0

Scenario choice: Scenario on One or Two encoded drugs not insulin

Goal: HbA1c <= 9%(Presence of HbA1c)

Reached goal? failed(HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013))

Action Choices

  • dAll CDS scenarios No ACE/ARB
    • Metformin checks preferred(rule in criterion Pres biguanide and not biguanide contraindicated evaluate to true because not biguanide contraindicated)])
      • [General_Info] Check B12 levels every 2 years as pt has Rx for metformin.
    • Msg start Insulin preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] If pt has severe hyperglycemia or excessive symptoms, consider starting insulin.
    • Set target HbA1c 2017 preferred(rule in criterion Absence Target HBA1c evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Refer to Table 2 from VA 2017 DM Guidelines to determine HbA1c target.
    • Shared Decision Making Action preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Strongly recommend shared decision making process, where pt, family and provider agree to plan of care and treatment. Info available here.
    • No Dx DM-2 but presence of DM meds preferred(rule in criterion No Dx DM-2 but presence of DM meds evaluate to true )])
      • [Primary_Recommendation] Pt has Rx for DM med but no DM Dx. Will assume Dx of DM2.
    • TLC preferred(rule in criterion true evaluate to true )])
      • [General_Info] Lifestyle changes to control DM. Info available here.
  • dTwo drug choices II
    • Make rec's preferred(strict rule-in condition not at goal and not bad TZD and gemfibrozil evaluate to true because HbA1c(10.0:06/11/2013) && NOT (Pres gemfibrozil and TZD and not TZD contra))])
  • Can Intensify or Sub
    • dIntensify II preferred(strict rule-in condition true evaluate to true )])
  • dIntensify choices II
    • dCannot Increase dose preferred(strict rule-in condition drug at max dose and not contraindicated evaluate to true because drug at max dose && NOT contraindication to non insulin agent)])
  • dCannot Increase dose choices
    • Rec 1st and 2nd line preferred(strict rule-in condition 1 or 2 DM ecoded meds evaluate to true because not 3+ encoded DM medsEncoded DM Drugs(1) && Encoded DM Drugs(1))])
      • Evaluate_Start_Activity Evaluate start 1st and and 2nd line
  • No meds, No recs
    • d3rd line therapy preferred(strict rule-in condition Absence of oral hypoglycemic agent rec add AND blocked add evaluate to true )])
      • [Drug_Related] Cannot recommend metformin, glipizide, pioglitazone, saxagliptin or, if CVD present, empaglifozin. Please consider other drugs from Appendix B of the VA 2017 DM Guidelines .
      • [Follow_Up] Follow up in 3 months
